item.title: Early Antibiotics Associated With Later Food Allergy
item.description: Antibiotic treatment in the first week of life was associated with food allergies at ages 9-12, according to a Dutch study. Medscape Medical News

item.title: How to Spot Diminishing Mental Acuity in Hospital Patients
item.description: Changes could be subtle or dramatic but always require examination and investigation. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Weight-Loss Surgery May Improve Liver Disease Outcomes
item.description: For some patients, procedures to reduce obesity can improve outcomes after a liver transplant. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Stroke Now Ranks Fourth as a Leading Cause of Death
item.description: Stroke now ranks as the fourth leading cause of death in the US. Rising deaths among young adults and the oldest Americans are of particular concern. ...

item.title: Cooled Laser Therapy Shows Early Success in Prostate Cancer
item.description: Researchers assess the adequacy of tissue ablation by a cooled laser therapy in patients with localized prostate cancer. Medscape Medical News
